title: CIVICUS reports U.S. civic freedoms in decline, democracy at risk
summary: CIVICUS Monitor's comprehensive report documents systematic decline in U.S. civic freedoms including freedom of association, peaceful assembly, and expression, warning that democratic institutions are under severe threat.

sources.title: Trump administration puts US civic freedoms under severe threat

US added to list of countries experiencing 'serious decline' in civic freedoms

notes: Detailed assessment showing U.S. joining countries like Israel and UK on watchlist for democratic backsliding
